scripts.android: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android
scripts.apk: react-native bundle --dev false --platform android --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./android/app/build/intermediates/assets/debug/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ./android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/debug && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
